授業目的: The main purpose of this class is to develop students’ ability to write various kinds of texts. Students begin by writing paragraphs, and then short, multi-paragraph essays.　To improve fluency students will keep a journal that must be completed weekly.
到達目標: The aim of this course is to help students write clearly in English on a number of  topics and to bridge the gap between short assignments and longer research papers.
授業方法:
From April 22 this class is online.

Students can only learn by being involved. The instructor will guide but it is up to the student to observe and learn.

第1回: Introduction to process writing and how to format paragraphs.
第14回: Week 14 - Review / Submission of final paper
トピック.授業外学習2: You will keep a weekly journal. Step by step, little by little you will make progress. Make a constant effort.
